name: piitu mitts
notes:
the lace pattern in these mitts is the same as in my [aava socks][1]. i named mitts piitu, as aava and piitu are the best friends!

yarn
 hand maiden casbah  (80 %  merino, 10 % nylon, 10 % cashmere;  115 g / 325 m). one skein colour pumpkin. mitts shown used 45 g / 127 m of yarn.

needles 
3 mm or to get gauge 

gauge 
27 sts and 40 rnds / 10 cm in st st 

notions 
yarn needle 
4 stitch markers 


 *suomenkielist√§ ohjetta ei ole testattu.* 
[1]: http://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/aava-2
